nodes.id: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

zh-cn: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造
生产资料私有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1953年至1956年间，对农业、手工业和资本主义工商业的生产资料所有制进行的社会主义改造运动，合称“三大改造”。
description.en: The socialist transformation movement of the ownership of the means of production in agriculture, handicrafts, and capitalist industry and commerce conducted by the People's Republic of China from 1953 to 1956, collectively known as the 'Three Great Transformations'.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，1953年至1956年间进行了生产资料所有制的社会主义改造。
description.en: A country in East Asia, which carried out the socialist transformation of the ownership of the means of production from 1953 to 1956.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1953年提出的指导从新民主主义向社会主义过渡时期工作的总路线，包含了“三大改造”的内容。
description.en: The general line proposed by the Communist Party of China in 1953 to guide the work during the transition period from New Democracy to socialism, which included the 'Three Great Transformations'.

description.zh-cn: “三大改造”之一，通过建立互助组、初级社、高级社等形式的合作社，将农民个体所有制改造为集体所有制的运动。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Transformations', a movement to transform individual peasant ownership into collective ownership by establishing cooperatives in forms such as mutual aid teams, elementary co-operatives, and advanced co-operatives.

nodes.id: 手工业的社会主义改造

zh-cn: 手工业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: “三大改造”之一，通过合作社形式将个体手工业者组织起来，实现社会主义改造。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Transformations', which organized individual handicraftsmen through cooperatives to achieve socialist transformation.

nodes.id: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

zh-cn: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: “三大改造”之一，通过和平赎买和国家资本主义形式，将私营资本主义工商业改造为社会主义公有制企业。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Transformations', which transformed private capitalist industry and commerce into socialist state-owned enterprises through peaceful redemption and state capitalism.

description.zh-cn: 指基于社会主义原则建立的社会经济和政治体系。1956年三大改造完成后，该制度在中国基本建立。
description.en: Refers to the socio-economic and political system established on socialist principles. After the completion of the Three Great Transformations in 1956, this system was fundamentally established in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党提出的理论，指中国从1956年社会主义改造基本完成到社会主义现代化基本实现的漫长历史阶段。
description.en: A theory proposed by the Communist Party of China, referring to the long historical period from the basic completion of socialist transformation in 1956 to the basic realization of socialist modernization in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。在《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》中明确提出了“社会主义初级阶段”的概念。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of the central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He explicitly put forward the concept of the 'primary stage of socialism' in the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

nodes.id: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 1981年中共中央通过的历史决议，首次明确提出“社会主义初级阶段”的概念。
description.en: A historical resolution passed by the CPC Central Committee in 1981, which for the first time clearly proposed the concept of the 'primary stage of socialism'.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平创立的马克思主义中国化理论成果，其中“社会主义初级阶段”理论是其重要组成部分。
description.en: The theoretical achievement of the Sinicization of Marxism founded by Deng Xiaoping, of which the theory of the 'primary stage of socialism' is an important component.

description.zh-cn: 前社会主义国家。中国的农业合作化运动仿照其建立合作社的模式。
description.en: A former socialist state. China's agricultural collectivization movement was modeled after its system of establishing cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，曾颁发一系列决议指导农业合作化运动。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China, which issued a series of resolutions to guide the agricultural collectivization movement.

description.zh-cn: 农业合作化运动第一阶段（1949-1953）的主要组织形式。
description.en: The main organizational form during the first stage (1949-1953) of the agricultural collectivization movement.

description.zh-cn: 农业合作化运动第二阶段（1954-1955上半年）的主要组织形式。
description.en: The main organizational form during the second stage (1954-mid 1955) of the agricultural collectivization movement.

description.zh-cn: 农业合作化运动第三阶段（1955下半年-1956）的主要组织形式。
description.en: The main organizational form during the third stage (late 1955-1956) of the agricultural collectivization movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。在1955年主张加速推动农业合作化运动。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He advocated for accelerating the agricultural collectivization movement in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 中共在对资本主义工商业进行社会主义改造时采取的一项政策，通过国家资本主义形式逐步改造私有企业。
description.en: A policy adopted by the CPC during the socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce, which gradually transformed private enterprises through state capitalism.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济形式，在对资本主义工商业的社会主义改造中被用作过渡手段。
description.en: An economic form used as a transitional means in the socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce.

description.zh-cn: 一种生产资料归社会全体或部分成员共同占有的所有制形式，是三大改造的目标。
description.en: A form of ownership in which the means of production are jointly owned by all or part of society, which was the goal of the Three Great Transformations.

description.zh-cn: 在资本主义工商业社会主义改造中，将私营企业转变为国家和私人共同经营的企业的一种形式。
description.en: A form of transforming private enterprises into jointly operated state-private enterprises during the socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce.

description.zh-cn: 1955年起在中国大陆各地出现的农民和手工业者要求退出农业或手工业合作社的社会风潮。
description.en: A social trend that emerged in mainland China from 1955, where peasants and handicraftsmen demanded to withdraw from agricultural or handicraft cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，是1950年代退社运动发生的地区之一。
description.en: A province of China, one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，是1950年代退社运动发生的地区之一。
description.en: A province of China, one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，是1950年代退社运动发生的地区之一。
description.en: A province of China, one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中国在计划经济时期对粮食等主要农产品实行统一收购和统一销售的政策，是引发农民不满和退社运动的原因之一。
description.en: A policy of unified purchase and sale of major agricultural products such as grain during China's planned economy period, which was one of the reasons for peasant dissatisfaction and the cooperative withdrawal movement.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家，曾以博弈论分析农业合作化与三年困难时期的关系。
description.en: An economist who used game theory to analyze the relationship between agricultural collectivization and the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 指中国在1959年至1961年期间发生的大规模饥荒。有学者认为农业合作化的强制推行是其原因之一。
description.en: Refers to the period of widespread famine in China from 1959 to 1961. Some scholars argue that the forced implementation of agricultural collectivization was one of its causes.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份。
description.en: A province of China.

description.zh-cn: 河北省下辖的县级市，建明社所在地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Hebei Province, where the Jianming Cooperative was located.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北遵化西铺村的一个农业生产合作社，是农业合作化运动的产物。
description.en: An agricultural producers' cooperative located in Xipu Village, Zunhua, Hebei, which was a product of the agricultural collectivization movement.

relationships.target: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造是过渡时期总路线所包含的核心内容之一。
description.en: The socialist transformation of the ownership of the means of production was one of the core components included in the General Line for the Transition Period.

relationships.source: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造在中华人民共和国境内进行，并深刻改变了其经济基础。
description.en: The socialist transformation of the ownership of the means of production was carried out within the People's Republic of China and profoundly changed its economic foundation.

relationships.source: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 农业的社会主义改造是“三大改造”的组成部分。
description.en: The socialist transformation of agriculture was a component of the 'Three Great Transformations'.

relationships.source: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造
relationships.target: 手工业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 手工业的社会主义改造是“三大改造”的组成部分。
description.en: The socialist transformation of handicrafts was a component of the 'Three Great Transformations'.

relationships.source: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造
relationships.target: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造是“三大改造”的组成部分。
description.en: The socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce was a component of the 'Three Great Transformations'.

relationships.source: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 1956年底三大改造基本完成，标志着社会主义制度（经济方面）在中国基本建立。
description.en: The basic completion of the Three Great Transformations by the end of 1956 marked the fundamental establishment of the socialist system (in its economic aspect) in China.

description.zh-cn: 社会主义制度在中国的基本建立，标志着中国进入社会主义初级阶段。
description.en: The fundamental establishment of the socialist system in China marked the country's entry into the primary stage of socialism.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1981年的《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》中第一次明确提出了“社会主义初级阶段”的概念。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping first clearly proposed the concept of the 'primary stage of socialism' in the 1981 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 该决议第一次明确提出了“社会主义初级阶段”的概念。
description.en: This resolution was the first to clearly propose the concept of the 'primary stage of socialism'.

description.zh-cn: 关于社会主义初级阶段的论述被总结为邓小平理论的重要组成部分。
description.en: The discourse on the primary stage of socialism was summarized as an important component of Deng Xiaoping Theory.

description.zh-cn: 中国的农业合作化运动仿照了苏联建立合作社的模式。
description.en: China's agricultural collectivization movement was modeled after the Soviet Union's method of establishing cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 从1951年12月开始，中共中央颁发了一系列决议，以规定和指导中国的农业社会主义改造。
description.en: Starting in December 1951, the CPC Central Committee issued a series of resolutions to define and guide China's socialist transformation of agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 1955年中，毛泽东主张并实行了加速推动农业合作化的政策。
description.en: In mid-1955, Mao Zedong advocated for and implemented a policy to accelerate the agricultural collectivization movement.

relationships.target: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 对资本主义工商业的社会主义改造采取了“和平赎买”的政策。
description.en: The policy of 'peaceful redemption' was adopted for the socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce.

relationships.target: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造是通过国家资本主义形式进行的。
description.en: The socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce was carried out through the form of state capitalism.

relationships.source: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 资本主义工商业的社会主义改造旨在将其改造成社会主义公有制企业。
description.en: The socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce aimed to convert them into socialist state-owned enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 全行业公私合营是“和平赎买”政策的一个关键阶段。
description.en: Industry-wide public-private partnership was a key stage in the 'peaceful redemption' policy.

description.zh-cn: 农业合作化运动是导致农民不满并要求退社的直接原因之一。
description.en: The agricultural collectivization movement was one of the direct causes of peasant dissatisfaction and their demand to withdraw from cooperatives.

relationships.source: 手工业的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 手工业合作化是导致手工业者要求退出合作社的原因之一。
description.en: The collectivization of handicrafts was one of the reasons for handicraftsmen to demand withdrawal from cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: “统购统销”政策是引发农民不满并要求退社的直接原因之一。
description.en: The policy of 'unified purchase and sale' was one of the direct causes of peasant dissatisfaction and their demand to withdraw from cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 广东省是发生退社运动的地区之一，据报有七万余农户退社。
description.en: Guangdong Province was one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred, with a reported over 70,000 peasant households withdrawing.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省是发生退社运动的地区之一。
description.en: Liaoning Province was one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省是发生退社运动的地区之一。
description.en: Jiangsu Province was one of the regions where the cooperative withdrawal movement occurred.

description.zh-cn: 根据林毅夫的分析，农业合作化于1958年秋从自愿变成强制，是造成三年困难时期农业产量下降的原因。
description.en: According to Justin Yifu Lin's analysis, the agricultural collectivization turning from voluntary to compulsory in the autumn of 1958 was a cause for the decline in agricultural output during the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 建明社是在农业合作化运动（集体化）中成立的农业生产合作社。
description.en: The Jianming Cooperative was an agricultural producers' cooperative established during the agricultural collectivization movement.

description.zh-cn: 建明社位于河北省遵化市西铺村。
description.en: The Jianming Cooperative is located in Xipu Village, Zunhua City, Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 遵化市是河北省下辖的县级市。
description.en: Zunhua is a county-level city under the administration of Hebei Province.
